meanings.definition: Of or relating to a person's life history.
meanings.sent1: The biographic details in the book helped me understand the character better.
meanings.sent2: She conducted a biographic study to learn more about her ancestors.
meanings.sent3: The biographic facts about the famous explorer were surprisingly entertaining.
meanings.sent4: Her biographic journey through hardships inspired many.
meanings.sent5: The biographic information was presented in a captivating manner.

meanings.definition: A written account of a person's life.
meanings.sent1: I found a biographic of a famous scientist at the library.
meanings.sent2: The biographic of the president was filled with interesting anecdotes.
meanings.sent3: Reading the biographic of a cat would be quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: Her life was like a biographic novel, full of twists and turns.
meanings.sent5: The biographic provided a detailed look into the artist's life.
